name: Alchemist's Assistant's Ascent Atop an Alp
name_original: Alchemist's Assistant's Ascent Atop an Alp
description:
Alchemist's Assistant's Ascent Atop an Alp: An Arduous Adventure, affectionately referred to as "nine-uh", is a 3D platforming game with a simple objective: collect 25 gold coins for your boss!

Use your simple but robust movement kit to traverse obstacles and get to the top of the treacherous...mountain?

Made for both SGDC Game Jam A (Theme: Altitude) and Pizza Jam (Theme: Movement).
